meanings.definition: A supercomputer is a powerful computer with high processing speed and capacity.
meanings.sent1: Supercomputers help scientists analyze huge amounts of data quickly.
meanings.sent2: Many research institutions rely on supercomputers for their projects.
meanings.sent3: The supercomputers at the lab work tirelessly to solve complex equations.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, supercomputers are the giants among machines.
meanings.sent5: The supercomputers hummed with activity, crunching numbers at lightning speed.

meanings.definition: Supercomputers are used for complex scientific calculations and simulations.
meanings.sent1: Researchers use supercomputers to model weather patterns and predict storms.
meanings.sent2: Supercomputers are essential tools in the field of computational biology.
meanings.sent3: The supercomputers at the university seem to have a mind of their own, running simulations non-stop.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of science, supercomputers act as the brainpower behind groundbreaking discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The supercomputers whirred with intensity, unraveling the mysteries of the universe.
